thread.title: A very centrally located budget hotel that is very convenient
thread.title_full: A very centrally located budget hotel that is very convenient - Review of Ibis Paris Defense Courbevoie, Courbevoie, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mark G
title: A very centrally located budget hotel that is very convenient
text:
This Ibis hotel follows the standard but is squeezed onto a small site in a building that is shared by its big brother Novotel. The location is excellent, a two minute walk from La Defence Esplanade metro station (the RER station at La Defense is a further five minutes west) right on the Champs Elysee with views over the river Seine towards the centre of Paris. The room I had was clean and tidy and importantly dark and quiet. The small breakfast room/restaurant was fine for an evening meal and quick breakfast in the morning. Avoid having to come here by car if you can as the car-park is across the square behind the hotel but still convenient if you have to travel this way.
Room Tip: Get up high for the views, ask for a room overlooking the river. See more room tips
